titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5819) to amend the Small Business Act to improve the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) program and the Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) program, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5819) to amend the Small Business Act to improve the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) program and the Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-603, by Mr. Welch (VT).
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 208.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1125.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 1125, Mr. Welch moved the previous question and by voice vote, the Chair announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings (WA) demanded the Yeas and Nays which were ordered, and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 194 (Roll no. 211).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 190 (Roll no. 212).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5819) to amend the Small Business Act to improve the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) program and the Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) program.
